title: betnomi
author: betnomi
created_time: December 03, 2022, 09:32:14 AMLast edit: December 14, 2022, 03:55:27 AM by betnomi
content: It's me again! This is the 5 round of 6 due to which the custom cold wallet will find its new owner.This RAFFLE is dedicated to the annual "Bitcointalk Community Awards" event where Betnomi was invited to be a sponsor! Good luck!Free shipping!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you voted in the topic Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜAfter I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - minerjones01 - krogoth02 - PawGo03 - xandry04 - famososMuertos05 - 5tift06 - TopTort77707 - QuakerBull08 - FinneysTrueVision09 - Real-Duke10 - Woodie11 - The_Crypto_Kid12 - Hotdog713 - HeRetiK14 - Dernoste15 - DirtyBirdE16 - Ryu_Ar117 - Steeley18 - rat03gopoh19 - hopenotlate20 - bitbollo21 - PM-ICT22 - Mitchell23 - Fundamentals Of24 - ajiz13825 - slimzak26 - julerz1227 - m201728 - Koal-8429 - Fattcatt30 - Woodie31 - Inwestour32 - Ryu_Ar133 - bullrun2020bro34 - hopenotlate35 - Stalker2236 - Stalker2237 - examplens38 - naira39 - salad daging40 - joker_josue41 - hodlmybtc42 - tweetious43 - cygan44 - wwzsocki45 - pinky123446 - sam0047 - Cryptogreatdane48 - Inwestour49 - Nara189250 - minerjones51 - Ratimov52 - aoluain53 - m201754 - Inagame55 - kryptowerk56 - 57 - rat03gopoh58 - bitbollo59 - bestcoin_5960 - naira61 - Mbitr62 - examplens63 - zuizui64 - NeuroticFish65 - Mauser66 - soonandwaite67 - TheBeardedBaby68 - Nara189269 - GreatArkansas70 - salad daging71 - Mbitr72 - owlcatz73 - F2b74 - willi997475 - Mauser76 - Amax1677 - cygan78 - MoparMiningLLC79 - Darker4580 - YodasRedRocket81 - JanEmil82 - JanEmil83 - haloxon84 - Dernoste85 - CoinageMint86 - NeuroticFish87 - ajiz13888 - Buchi-8889 - joker_josue90 - DirtyBirdE91 - shahzadafzal92 - bullrun2020bro93 - klarki94 - GazetaBitcoin95 - Remsjack96 - Themepen97 - doblezero98 - famososMuertos99 - shahzadafzalPlease let me know if the raffle rules need to be improved ü¶äNote:Quote
